text:
I’m super excited to bring to 
you a very requested lesson

with one of the most successful 
family dramas: This is Us.

This series features well-known actors like Mandy 
Moore, Milo Ventimiglia, and Sterling K. Brown

If you enjoy learning with your favorite 
TV series, movies, actors, and much more,

don't wait to join our community of 
more than 5M global learners who now can

understand English without getting lost, without 
missing the jokes, and without subtitles! Just hit

the subscribe button and the bell down below to 
make sure you don't miss any of the new lessons.

Now before watching the scene without 
subtitles and taking a quiz on it,

don't forget to subscribe so you 
don't miss any of our lessons.

If you want to continue learning English that 
you can use with confidence anywhere and anytime,

then I highly recommend you check this lesson 
on How To Learn English By Yourself (At Home).
